00036 CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter()
00037 {
00038         m_BufferSize = 0;
00039         m_MaxBufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00040 }
00041 
00042 CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::~CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter()
00043 {
00044         FlushBuffer();
00045         Cleanup();
00046 }
00047 
00048 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::Cleanup()
00049 {
00050         for (int target=0; target<(int)m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers.size(); target++) 
00051         { 
00052         int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target].size();
00053         for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00054             delete[] m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target][ibuf];
00055                 m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target].clear();
00056         }
00057         m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers.clear();
00058         m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeRowIndexes.clear();
00059 
00060         for (int target=0; target<(int)m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers.size(); target++) 
00061         { 
00062         int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target].size();
00063         for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00064             delete[] m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target][ibuf];
00065                 m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target].clear();
00066         }
00067         m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers.clear();
00068         m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberRowIndexes.clear();
00069     
00070         for (int target=0; target<(int)m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers.size(); target++) 
00071         { 
00072         int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target].size();
00073         for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00074             delete[] m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target][ibuf];
00075                 m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target].clear();
00076         }
00077         m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers.clear();
00078         m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionRowIndexes.clear();
00079 
00080         for (int target=0; target<(int)m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers.size(); target++) 
00081         { 
00082         int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target].size();
00083         for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00084             delete[] m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target][ibuf];
00085                 m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target].clear();
00086         }
00087         m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers.clear();
00088         m_TargetMultiDataExpressionRowIndexes.clear();
00089 
00090     dataSetIndexMap.clear();
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::Initialize(vector<string> *CHPFileNames, std::vector<MultiDataType> &dataTypes, std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxProbeSetNameLength)
00094 {
00095         m_CHPFileNames = CHPFileNames;
00096     m_maxProbeSetNameLength = maxProbeSetNameLength;
00097     exprBufferSize = 0;
00098     genoBufferSize = 0;
00099     cnBufferSize = 0;
00100     cyBufferSize = 0;
00101         Cleanup();
00102         for (int i=0; i<(int)m_CHPFileNames->size(); i++)
00103         {
00104         for (int itype=0; itype<(int)dataTypes.size(); itype++)
00105         {
00106             switch (dataTypes[itype])
00107             {
00108                 case CopyNumberMultiDataType:
00109                     {
00110                                 vector<char *> buffer;
00111                                 m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers.push_back(buffer);
00112                     }
00113                     m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00114                     break;
00115 
00116                 case CytoMultiDataType:
00117                     {
00118                                 vector<char *> buffer;
00119                                 m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers.push_back(buffer);
00120                     }
00121                     m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00122                     break;
00123 
00124                 case GenotypeMultiDataType:
00125                     {
00126                                 vector<char *> buffer;
00127                                 m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers.push_back(buffer);
00128                     }
00129                     m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00130                     break;
00131 
00132                 case ExpressionMultiDataType:
00133                     {
00134                                 vector<char *> buffer;
00135                                 m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers.push_back(buffer);
00136                     }
00137                     m_TargetMultiDataExpressionRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00138                     break;
00139 
00140                 default:
00141                     // we currently do not handle any other types
00142                     break;
00143 
00144             }
00145         }
00146         }
00147     m_BufferSize = 0;
00148     for (int i=0; i<(int)dataTypes.size(); i++)    
00149     {
00150         dataSetIndexMap[dataTypes[i]] = i;
00151     }
00152 }

00154 // static to keep function local to this file - perhaps this should be a static private member function? -AW
00155 static int GetMetricBufferSize(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00156 {
00157     int bufferSize = 0;
00158         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00159         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00160         {
00161                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00162                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00163                 {
00164                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00165                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt8());
00166                                 break;
00167 
00168                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00169                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt8());
00170                                 break;
00171 
00172                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00173                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt16());
00174                                 break;
00175 
00176                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00177                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt16());
00178                                 break;
00179 
00180                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00181                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt32());
00182                                 break;
00183 
00184                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00185                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt32());
00186                                 break;
00187 
00188                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00189                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueFloat());
00190                                 break;
00191 
00192                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00193                 bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00194                                 bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueAscii().length() * sizeof(char));
00195                                 break;
00196 
00197                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00198                 bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00199                                 bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueText().length() * sizeof(wchar_t));
00200                                 break;
00201             
00202             case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00203                 break;
00204                 }
00205         }
00206     return bufferSize;
00207 }
00208 
00209 // static to keep function local to this file - perhaps this should be a static private member function? -AW
00210 static void CopyMetricToBuffer(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics, char * &pbuffer)
00211 {
00212         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00213         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00214         {
00215                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00216                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00217                 {
00218                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00219                                 *pbuffer = nv.GetValueInt8();
00220                 pbuffer += sizeof(int8_t);
00221                                 break;
00222 
00223                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00224                                 *pbuffer = nv.GetValueUInt8();
00225                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int8_t);
00226                                 break;
00227 
00228                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00229                                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt16());
00230                 pbuffer += sizeof(int16_t);
00231                                 break;
00232 
00233                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00234                                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt16());
00235                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int16_t);
00236                                 break;
00237 
00238                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00239                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt32());
00240                 pbuffer += sizeof(int32_t);
00241                                 break;
00242 
00243                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00244                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt32());
00245                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00246                                 break;
00247 
00248                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00249                                 MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueFloat());
00250                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00251                                 break;
00252 
00253                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00254                                 {
00255                                 string s = nv.GetValueAscii();
00256                                 int l = (int) s.length();
00257                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, l);
00258                 pbuffer += sizeof(int32_t);
00259                                 strcpy(pbuffer, s.c_str());
00260                 pbuffer += l;
00261                                 }
00262                                 break;
00263 
00264                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00265                             // @todo write out wide strings
00266                 assert(0==1);
00267                 break;
00268 
00269             case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00270                 break;
00271                 }
00272         }
00273 }
00274 
00275 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry)
00276 {
00277     if (genoBufferSize == 0)
00278         genoBufferSize = m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.call) + sizeof(entry.confidence) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00279     char *buffer = new char[genoBufferSize];
00280     memset(buffer, 0, genoBufferSize);
00281     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00282     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType]);
00283     pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00284     memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00285     pbuffer += m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00286     *pbuffer = entry.call;
00287     pbuffer += sizeof(char);
00288     MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.confidence);
00289     pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00290     CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00291     m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target].push_back(buffer);
00292     m_BufferSize += genoBufferSize;
00293 
00294         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00295         {
00296                 FlushBuffer();
00297         }
00298 }
00299 
00300 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataExpressionEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData &entry)
00301 {
00302     if (exprBufferSize == 0)
00303         exprBufferSize = m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.quantification) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00304     char *buffer = new char[exprBufferSize];
00305     memset(buffer, 0, exprBufferSize);
00306     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00307     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType]);
00308     pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00309     memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00310     pbuffer += m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00311     MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.quantification);
00312     pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00313     CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00314     m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target].push_back(buffer);
00315     m_BufferSize += exprBufferSize;
00316     
00317         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00318         {
00319                 FlushBuffer();
00320     }
00321 }

00324 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataCopyNumberEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData &entry)
00325 {
00326     if (cnBufferSize == 0)
00327         cnBufferSize = m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.chr) + sizeof(entry.position) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00328     char *buffer = new char[cnBufferSize];
00329     memset(buffer, 0, cnBufferSize);
00330     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00331     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType]);
00332     pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00333     memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00334     pbuffer += m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00335     MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.chr);
00336     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.chr);
00337     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.position);
00338     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.position);
00339     CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00340     m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target].push_back(buffer);
00341     m_BufferSize += cnBufferSize;
00342 
00343     if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00344         {
00345                 FlushBuffer();
00346         }
00347 }

00349 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataCytoRegionEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData &entry)
00350 {
00351     if (cyBufferSize == 0)
00352         cyBufferSize = m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.chr) +
00353                 sizeof(entry.startPosition) + sizeof(entry.stopPosition) + sizeof(entry.call) +
00354                 sizeof(entry.confidenceScore) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00355     char *buffer = new char[cyBufferSize];
00356     memset(buffer, 0, cyBufferSize);
00357     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00358     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType]);
00359     pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00360     memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00361     pbuffer += m_maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00362     MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.chr);
00363     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.chr);
00364     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.startPosition);
00365     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.startPosition);
00366     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.stopPosition);
00367     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.stopPosition);
00368     MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.call);
00369     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.call);
00370     MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.confidenceScore);
00371     pbuffer += sizeof(entry.confidenceScore);
00372     CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00373     m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target].push_back(buffer);
00374     m_BufferSize += cyBufferSize;
00375 
00376     if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00377         {
00378                 FlushBuffer();
00379         }
00380 }
00381 
00382 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::FlushBuffer()
00383 {
00384         if(m_BufferSize > 0)
00385         {
00386                 for (int target=0; target<(int)m_CHPFileNames->size(); target++)
00387                 {
00388                         CalvinCHPFileUpdater updater;
00389                         updater.OpenCHPFile((*m_CHPFileNames)[target].c_str());
00390 
00391             if (m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeRowIndexes.size() > 0)
00392             {
00393                 updater.UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntryBuffer(GenotypeMultiDataType, m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeRowIndexes[target], genoBufferSize, m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target]);
00394                             m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeRowIndexes[target] += (int) m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target].size();
00395                 int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target].size();
00396                 for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00397                     delete[] m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target][ibuf];
00398                         m_TargetMultiDataGenotypeBuffers[target].clear();
00399             }
00400 
00401             if (m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberRowIndexes.size() > 0)
00402             {
00403                 updater.UpdateMultiDataCopyNumberEntryBuffer(CopyNumberMultiDataType, m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberRowIndexes[target], cnBufferSize, m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target]);
00404                             m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberRowIndexes[target] += (int) m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target].size();
00405                 int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target].size();
00406                 for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00407                     delete[] m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target][ibuf];
00408                         m_TargetMultiDataCopyNumberBuffers[target].clear();
00409             }
00410 
00411             if (m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionRowIndexes.size() > 0)
00412             {
00413                 updater.UpdateMultiDataCytoRegionEntryBuffer(CytoMultiDataType, m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionRowIndexes[target], cyBufferSize, m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target]);
00414                             m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionRowIndexes[target] += (int) m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target].size();
00415                 int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target].size();
00416                 for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00417                     delete[] m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target][ibuf];
00418                         m_TargetMultiDataCytoRegionBuffers[target].clear();
00419             }
00420 
00421             if (m_TargetMultiDataExpressionRowIndexes.size() > 0)
00422             {
00423                 updater.UpdateMultiDataExpressionEntryBuffer(ExpressionMultiDataType, m_TargetMultiDataExpressionRowIndexes[target], exprBufferSize, m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target]);
00424                             m_TargetMultiDataExpressionRowIndexes[target] += (int) m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target].size();
00425                 int nbufs = (int) m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target].size();
00426                 for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00427                     delete[] m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target][ibuf];
00428                         m_TargetMultiDataExpressionBuffers[target].clear();
00429             }
00430 
00431                         updater.CloseCHPFile();
00432                 }
00433         }
00434         m_BufferSize = 0;
00435 }
